subject: AW: [junit] Writing tests for private methods
messageBody:
See http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?ExtremeProgrammingTestingPrivateMethods

> -----Ursprungliche Nachricht-----
> Von: Clemmons, Scott [mailto:scott.clemmons@...]
> Gesendet: Freitag, 27. Juli 2001 16:15
> An: JUnit
> Betreff: [junit] Writing tests for private methods
>
>
> This is probably in a FAQ document somewhere, if so please
> direct me to it.
>
> How does one test a private method? Is the only recourse to
> make the method protected or package private, thus "exposing"
> the method more than desired?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Scott
> :-> Change is inevitable except from vending machines.
